title: EnergyGate: How a $100 Million Corruption Scandal Exposes Fractures in Western Support for Ukraine
summary: A massive corruption scandal in Ukraine's energy sector has triggered ministerial resignations and exposed deep tensions within European support for Kyiv. Russian media coverage reveals how Moscow frames Western aid fatigue and internal EU divisions.
